title: Disconnecting to PvP.net
body: My client keeps disconnecting to PvP.net. Because of this, I can't go into a game. My internet is not a problem. It works outside of the client. It just doesn't work in the client. I played yesterday and it was working fine. Someone help me! Thanks..

replies.body: it's not entirely uncommon for your network to work completely fine normally but not be able to reach specific servers (i.e. Leagues servers). Let's look over your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to double check for any inconsistencies there first, but let me know if nothing seems to help.
